cms_populate¶

Population functions for the CMS.

cms_populate.populate(table, n, default=True, values=None)¶

Custom population function, for web2cms

Parameters:
  • table – Table to populate
  • n – Amount of records to generate
  • default – Whether to use default value if one specified, or not
  • values –

    A list to be used to populate fields. It can be: - a fixed value, used directly - callable: will be called with (table, fieldname) and the

    return value used as field value
